panels.visual: Chaos in the sword shop. Corpium smashes the display case while Armando casts a spell. Guards pour in through the door. Glass and magic fly everywhere.
The fight escalates rapidly. Corpium swings Patricia II while guards overwhelm them with numbers. Armando's spells flash but they're outnumbered.
Eurostras bursts in with Ryan, who looks furious and disappointed. The wizard raises his staff, magical energy crackling.
The party in prison cells. Eurostras without his ring looks lost. Corpium sits stoically. Armando, in a better cell, smirks - his charm spell on Ryan worked.
panels.dialogue: Guard: "Execution at dawn for the dragonborn and the monk. The warlock gets a month."
